TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyPressEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks A指定當使用者按下按鍵時，由所組成的字元。A specifies the character that is composed when the user presses a key. 例如，當使用者按下 SHIFT + K、屬性會傳回大寫的 k。For example, when the user presses SHIFT + K, the property returns an uppercase K. A事件發生於使用者按下按鍵時。A event occurs when the user presses a key. 密切相關的兩個事件事件和。Two events that are closely related to the event are and . 事件之前每事件，當使用者按下按鍵，和事件發生於使用者放開按鍵時。The event precedes each event when the user presses a key, and a event occurs when the user releases a key. 當使用者按住按鍵時，重複和字元重複每次發生的事件。When the user holds down a key, duplicate and events occur each time the character repeats. 一個在發行時，就會產生事件。One event is generated upon release. 與每個事件，傳遞。With each event, a is passed. A會使用每個傳遞和事件。A is passed with each and event. A指定是否以及另一個按鍵按下任何輔助按鍵 （CTRL、 shift 鍵或 ALT）。A specifies whether any modifier keys (CTRL, SHIFT, or ALT) were pressed along with another key. (此修飾詞資訊也可以透過取得屬性類別。)(This modifier information can also be obtained through the property of the class.) 設定要`true`取消`KeyPress`事件。Set to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event. 這可防止控制項處理的按鍵。This keeps the control from processing the key press. > [!NOTE] > 有些控制項將處理上的特定按鍵。Some controls will process certain key strokes on . 例如，處理 Enter 鍵之前呼叫。For example, processes the Enter key before is called. 在此情況下，您無法取消事件，且必須取消從索引鍵的筆劃改。In such cases, you cannot cancel the event, and must cancel the key stroke from instead. 事件模型的相關資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用計算使用者按下的索引鍵，並顯示每個按鍵動作之後的結果。The following example illustrates using the to count keys as they are pressed and to display the results after each key press. 然後設為 true 保持作業系統從進一步處理索引鍵。 is then set to true to keep the operating system from further processing the key. 此範例假設表單置於其上。The example assumes a form with a placed on it. [!code-cpp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 您必須建立這個類別的新執行個體。You must create a new instance of this class. 您也必須設定的事件處理常式。You must also set the event handler. 您可以在建構函式類別。You can do this in the constructor for your class. [!code-cpp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 當控制項中引發指定的事件時，會呼叫附加的方法，應用程式可以執行程式碼，以回應事件。When the specified event is raised in the control, the attached method is called and the application can execute code in response to the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性取得的輔助按鍵的目前狀態。Use the property to get the current state of the modifier keys. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示訊息方塊顯示 SHIFT 鍵的目前狀態。The following example displays a message box that shows the current state of the SHIFT key.

if the event is handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未處理的事件，它會傳送至作業系統的預設處理。If the event is not handled, it will be sent to the operating system for default processing. 設定要`true`取消`KeyPress`事件。Set to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event. ## Examples 下列範例會建立控制項。The following example creates a control. `keypressed`方法會使用屬性，以檢查是否按下 ENTER 鍵。The `keypressed` method uses the property to check whether the ENTER key is pressed. 如果按下 ENTER 鍵時，屬性設定為`true`，這表示事件處理。If the ENTER key is pressed, the property is set to `true`, which indicates the event is handled. [!code-cpp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定對應於所按下按鍵的字元。

span.span: Gets or sets the character corresponding to the key pressed.
The ASCII character that is composed.

value.span: 例如，如果使用者按下 SHIFT + K，這個屬性就傳回大寫的 K。

span.span: For example, if the user presses SHIFT + K, this property returns an uppercase K.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以在執行階段，並修改特殊執行階段的情況下的按鍵的按鍵動作範例。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to modify keystrokes under special run-time circumstances. 例如，您可以使用要在使用者輸入郵遞區號時，請停用非數字個按鍵動作之後，變更為大寫的資料輸入欄位中，所有依字母順序排列的按鍵或鍵盤或其他重要的輸入的裝置特定的索引鍵組合來監視。For example, you can use to disable non-numeric keypresses when the user enters a ZIP code, change all alphabetical keypresses to uppercase in a data entry field, or monitor the keyboard or other key input device for specific key combinations. 您可以取得或設定下列機碼：You can get or set the following keys: - a-z, A-Z.a-z, A-Z. - CTRL 鍵。CTRL. - 標點符號。Punctuation marks. - 數字鍵，同時在頂端的鍵盤和數字鍵台上。Number keys, both across the top of the keyboard and on the numeric keypad. - 輸入。ENTER. 您無法取得或設定下列機碼：You cannot get or set the following keys: - TAB 鍵。The TAB key. - 插入和刪除。INSERT and DELETE. - 首頁。HOME. - 結束。END. - PAGE UP 和 PAGE down 鍵。PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN. - F1-F2.F1-F2. - ALT 鍵。ALT. - 方向鍵Arrow keys. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關如何偵測任何先前所述的非字元按鍵的資訊，請參閱類別。For information about how to detect any of the non-character keys mentioned above, see the class. - ## Examples 下列範例會建立控制項。The following example creates a control. `keypressed`方法會使用屬性，以檢查是否按下 ENTER 鍵。The `keypressed` method uses the property to check whether the ENTER key pressed. 如果按下 ENTER 鍵時，屬性設定為`true`，這表示事件處理。If the ENTER key is pressed, the property is set to `true`, which indicates the event is handled. [!code-cpp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/VB/form1.vb#1)]
